    GuessEvaluation - Class in org.fdu
    Evaluates the users guess against the secret word (selected from the dictionary) Defines the colors indicating the "correctness" of each character in the user's guess Tracks the number of guesses by the user, initialized by constructor, incremented by evaluater method to check if user has used all of the allowable guesses class assumes the users guess has been validated prior to calling here ToDo - throw exception if the userGuess and/or secretWord are not valid Or at the very least, return all Gray
    GuessEvaluation() - Constructor for class org.fdu.GuessEvaluation
     
    GuessEvaluation.Result - Enum Class in org.fdu
    Enum defining the valid colors for guess evaluation
    GuessValidation - Class in org.fdu
    GuessValidation Class Codes validation rules including length (exactly 5 characters), allowable characters (a-z and A-Z) Normalizes the guess (removes leading and trailing white space), shifts all characters to UPPERCASE WORD_LENGTH - defines the length for guesses and secret words
    GuessValidation() - Constructor for class org.fdu.GuessValidation
